quote: Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Patience is not simply the ability to wait - it's how we behave while we're waiting.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Great works are performed not by strength but by perseverance.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
name: Napoleon Hill

quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
name: Saadi

quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Each life is made up of mistakes and learning, waiting and growing, practicing patience and being persistent.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Patience and perseverance have a magical effect before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish.
name: John Quincy Adams

quote: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious.
name: Phillips Brooks

quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Have patience with all things, But, first of all with yourself.
name: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Hope is patience with the lamp lit.
name: Tertullian

quote: The test of good manners is to be patient with the bad ones.
name: Solomon Ibn Gabirol

quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
name: Helen Keller

quote: The key to everything is patience. You get the chicken by hatching the egg, not by smashing it.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Alcohol gives you infinite patience for stupidity.
name: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: I am patient with stupidity but not with those who are proud of it.
name: Edith Sitwell

quote: With love and patience, nothing is impossible.
name: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Genius is patience.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Knowing trees, I understand the meaning of patience. Knowing grass, I can appreciate persistence.
name: Hal Borland

quote: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience.
name: Evelyn Underhill

quote: The more you know yourself, the more patience you have for what you see in others.
name: Erik Erikson

quote: Patience and Diligence, like faith, remove mountains.
name: William Penn

quote: Patience has its limits. Take it too far, and it's cowardice.
name: George Jackson

quote: I am blessed to be surrounded by the people I love. I thank them for their patience and grace.
name: Matt Lauer

quote: If you would know strength and patience, welcome the company of trees.
name: Hal Borland

quote: Endurance is nobler than strength, and patience than beauty.
name: John Ruskin

quote: Our patience will achieve more than our force.
name: Edmund Burke

quote: Patience is the secret to good food.
name: Gail Simmons

quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
name: George Savile

quote: The greatest power is often simple patience.
name: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Beware the fury of a patient man.
name: John Dryden

quote: Patience and time do more than strength or passion.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: If I have done the public any service, it is due to my patient thought.
name: Isaac Newton

quote: He who rides the sea of the Nile must have sails woven of patience.
name: William Golding

quote: Patience is necessary, and one cannot reap immediately where one has sown.
name: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Genius is eternal patience.
name: Michelangelo

quote: With care and patience, people may accomplish things which, to an indolent person, would appear impossible.
name: Dorothea Dix

quote: To learn patience is not to rebel against every hardship.
name: Henri Nouwen

quote: You can't jump from little things to big things. It just takes time and patience.
name: Nadia Comaneci

quote: Humility is attentive patience.
name: Simone Weil

quote: Patience and tenacity are worth more than twice their weight of cleverness.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: The strong manly ones in life are those who understand the meaning of the word patience.
name: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: I don't think I have the ability or patience to teach badminton to others.
name: Saina Nehwal

quote: Patience is key for getting over a breakup. That, and trailing off your interaction after the breakup.
name: Drake

quote: The Lord, Jesus Christ, is our perfect example of patience.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: You must first have a lot of patience to learn to have patience.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: I'm patient with crossword puzzles and the most impatient golfer.
name: Brett Hull

quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
name: Virgil

quote: The very important thing you should have is patience.
name: Jack Ma

quote: Be patient. Patience is the mother of all virtues.
name: Hrithik Roshan

quote: I'm patient.
name: Michael Jordan

quote: The one thing about the business of entertainment is that you have to learn patience.
name: Kevin Hart

quote: Who ever is out of patience is out of possession of their soul.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: Good ideas are not adopted automatically. They must be driven into practice with courageous patience.
name: Hyman Rickover

quote: When things begin accelerating wildly out of control, sometimes patience is the only answer. Press pause.
name: Douglas Rushkoff

quote: Like anything worth doing in life, happiness takes time and patience and consistency.
name: Mark Manson

quote: Business is a sprint until you find an opportunity, then it's the patience of a marathon runner.
name: Robert Herjavec

quote: Patience means restraining one's inclinations.
name: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: Gardening is a working meditation for me. It helps me remember process, and it helps me remember patience.
name: Lizz Wright

quote: Patience, n. A minor form of dispair, disguised as a virtue.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: The principle part of faith is patience.
name: George MacDonald

quote: I still have to work on patience.
name: Robert Mueller

quote: I have no patience with dinosaurs.
name: Adam West

quote: I can imagine few things more trying to the patience than the long wasted days of waiting.
name: Robert Falcon Scott

quote: All men commend patience, although few are willing to practice it.
name: Thomas a Kempis

quote: No, I will be the pattern of all patience; I will say nothing.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: How poor are they that have not patience! What wound did ever heal but by degrees?
name: William Shakespeare

quote: He that can have patience can have what he will.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Patience is the ability to idle your motor when you feel like stripping your gears.
name: Barbara Johnson

quote: Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.
name: Plautus

quote: My three Ps: passion, patience, perseverance. You have to do this if you've got to be a filmmaker.
name: Robert Wise

quote: Patience can't be acquired overnight. It is just like building up a muscle. Every day you need to work on it.
name: Eknath Easwaran

quote: Endurance is patience concentrated.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Fortune knocks but once, but misfortune has much more patience.
name: Laurence J. Peter

quote: God always has patience.
name: Pope Francis

quote: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform.
name: Homer

quote: I make really good pasta sauce. The secret to getting it right is just patience and love.
name: Banks

quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: I think patience is a skill and I wish I had it.
name: David Duchovny

quote: Patience is the art of hoping.
name: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Meekness: Uncommon patience in planning a revenge that is worth while.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength.
name: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: I have no patience for wasting time.
name: William Clay Ford, Jr.

quote: Patience was not something that came naturally to me, but in cooking it is the quintessential skill.
name: Gail Simmons

quote: A monk's extraordinary patience can be a hindrance to desperate decision-making.
name: Harsha Bhogle

quote: I have not the smarts or patience for political office.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: Heaven grant us patience with a man in love.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Teach us, O Lord, the disciplines of patience, for to wait is often harder than to work.
name: Peter Marshall

quote: It takes patience to appreciate domestic bliss; volatile spirits prefer unhappiness.
name: George Santayana

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: I'm a peace-maker, I can fit into a lot of situations. I'm pretty easygoing. I have a lot of patience.
name: Jennifer Garner

quote: There comes a time when you have to exercise patience.
name: Columbus Short

quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: Endurance is the crowning quality, And patience all the passion of great hearts.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: Find patience in the breath of life.
name: Ryunosuke Satoro

quote: Patience with family members and others who are close to us is vital for us to have happy homes.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: We have no patience with other people's vanity because it is offensive to our own.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Sad Patience, too near neighbour to despair.
name: Matthew Arnold

quote: I think I have more patience now than I did in the past.
name: T. Boone Pickens

quote: Never a tear bedims the eye that time and patience will not dry.
name: Bret Harte

quote: I've always admired teachers for their patience and purpose in choosing their profession.
name: Eve Arden

quote: If I am right about the big picture, I will be rewarded for my patience.
name: Thomas Kaplan

quote: Patience, the beggar's virtue, shall find no harbor here.
name: Philip Massinger

quote: I like playing. I wouldn't be a good coach. I don't have the patience to be a coach.
name: Tom Brady

quote: Bear patiently with a rival.
name: Ovid

quote: Dating someone on the opposite end of the happy spectrum teaches you an incredible amount of patience.
name: Chris Pine

quote: Lack of pep is often mistaken for patience.
name: Kin Hubbard

quote: All commend patience, but none can endure to suffer.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Abused patience turns to fury.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Patience is the best medicine.
name: John Florio

quote: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination.
name: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quote: The only thing you have to have is patience and an attitude that you aren't ever going to give up.
name: Shawn Michaels

quote: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: You have to find the peace and patience within yourself to be a model and an example to others and not judge.
name: Judith Light

quote: I haven't been given many things, but I've been given ample, limitless patience.
name: Lincoln Diaz-Balart

quote: If you have confidence you have patience. Confidence, that is everything.
name: Ilie Nastase

quote: The biggest challenge, I think for any new artist, is patience.
name: Brett Eldredge

quote: I've done an awful lot of stuff that's a monument to public patience.
name: Tyrone Power

quote: I've always been a person with patience, and I don't like to force things.
name: Harry Shum, Jr.

quote: A career in showbiz is like a distance run. You have to have patience and pace yourself.
name: Tate Donovan

quote: Patience is passion tamed.
name: Lyman Abbott

quote: No one thought the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight would happen, but I had patience.
name: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: Hopelessness has surprised me with patience.
name: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: The practice of patience in crafting and process is a virtue that needs to come back.
name: Zac Posen

quote: A healthy male adult bore consumes each year one and a half times his own weight in other people's patience.
name: John Updike

quote: The difference between rearing a child in your 20s and one in your 50s is one of patience.
name: Iman

quote: Coaching takes patience. I'm more enthused when teaching players who want it versus when I have to.
name: Kevin Garnett

quote: Everyone ought to bear patiently the results of his own conduct.
name: Phaedrus

quote: Everyone is bound to bear patiently the results of his own example.
name: Phaedrus

quote: Golf is all about patience - one tournament is four days long, 18 holes a day.
name: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I think every war certainly wears on national will and national patience, particularly a counterinsurgency.
name: Stanley A. McChrystal

quote: I believe there's too little patience and context to many of the investigations I read or see on television.
name: Bob Woodward

quote: Horses teach you patience and how to do things the right way so you can get the right result.
name: Lyle Lovett

quote: Learning patience was not an easy lesson.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: Writing is boring, very boring, and it takes so much patience.
name: Ingmar Bergman

quote: You have to have patience to be a legislator.
name: Gene Green

quote: Patience was not my strong point.
name: Lauren Bacall

quote: I tolerate lots of people I have no patience or respect for. Then, as soon as I can, I rat on them.
name: Andre Aciman

quote: I know one of the reasons God gave me kids was to test my patience.
name: Faith Hill

quote: Patience, discipline - giving everything on court... This is what I'm trying to bring in every single match.
name: Angelique Kerber

quote: I've never had the patience of a teacher.
name: Josh Turner

quote: I don't play pyrotechnic scales. I play about frustration, patience, anger. Music is an extension of my soul.
name: Dick Dale

quote: I think God's really blessed me with patience. I'm good with a lot of things going on at once.
name: Niki Taylor

quote: When I have a job to do, time means nothing. I lose patience with people who work on a clock.
name: Don Cornelius

quote: There are very little things in this life I cannot afford and patience is one of them.
name: Larry Hagman

quote: My advice to someone to follow in my footsteps is to have patience. I've been doing this for twelve years.
name: Christina Milian

quote: For some reason, every time I get a little bit under the weather, I've got zero patience.
name: Jason Day

quote: I've got to really try and manage my patience out there.
name: Jason Day

quote: The best thing Jay-Z ever taught me was patience.
name: Rita Ora

quote: Because I have so many brothers and sisters, I think I'm able to have a certain patience.
name: Rza

quote: I wish I had more patience.
name: Toni Collette

quote: Patience is the art of concealing your impatience.
name: Guy Kawasaki

quote: I will exercise patience and will provide all facts to the general public.
name: Yingluck Shinawatra

quote: The patience of the American public with dilatory diplomatic delays will be very limited.
name: Tom Lantos

quote: I don't have a lot of patience for movies that aren't cleanly told.
name: Jon Favreau

quote: I've learned that anything in life worth having comes from patience and hard work.
name: Greg Behrendt

quote: Thank God my parents had an abundance of patience.
name: Lexa Doig

quote: I'm terrible with patience.
name: Katherine Heigl

quote: This is the story of what a Woman's patience can endure, and what a Man's resolution can achieve.
name: Wilkie Collins

quote: I like to take my own time, and I don't like to rush. I do take time, and I have patience.
name: Nargis Fakhri

quote: The biggest thing I possess is infinite patience. Once you are patient, things fall in place.
name: Mohammad Azharuddin

quote: Patience is sorrow's salve.
name: Charles Churchill

quote: I think there's not much patience for organized labour, period, public or private sector.
name: Kathleen Wynne

quote: If I could have one prayer answered, I would pray for patience. I move so fast sometimes. I try to slow down.
name: Debra Winger

quote: I have an equal amount of patience as my grade-school children, which is not great.
name: Mike D

quote: There are very few things that I have any patience for that are not at least a little bit humorous.
name: Elif Batuman

quote: Patience pays off.
name: Mayte Garcia

quote: He preacheth patience that never knew pain.
name: Henry George Bohn

quote: I tell people all the time, the status quo is so untenable to me. Like, literally, I have no patience for it.
name: Michael Tubbs

quote: I've been called Mr. Patient Money because I have the patience to work through challenging circumstances.
name: N. Murray Edwards

quote: I have no patience at all.
name: Alan Sugar

quote: Patience has its limits, take it too far and it's cowardice.
name: Holbrook Jackson

quote: I kind of feel like... I have a slower instinct than most live-action directors, but I have more patience.
name: Pete Docter

quote: Temperamentally I'm not a natural producer, because I don't have the patience.
name: Damian Lewis

quote: People need patience. It takes time to build a brand.
name: Carmen Busquets

quote: I don't have a lot of patience for boring arthouse movies.
name: Zoe Kazan

quote: Being a runner has brought me a lot of patience, and patience goes a long way in life.
name: Tori Bowie

quote: In this day and age, you need a lot of patience if you are in the movie business.
name: Brett Ratner

quote: I wish I was a shredder that could play everything, but I don't have the patience.
name: Dave Navarro

quote: I don't have much patience with sick people.
name: Maura Tierney

quote: I've said my patience is not infinite.
name: Darrell Issa

quote: Is the patience of the American people that long suffering? Is there no outrage left in the country?
name: Andrew Greeley

quote: An impatient person plays differently than a more patient person.
name: Vladimir Kramnik

quote: When it comes to work, I have a lot of patience, but otherwise, I am quite impatient.
name: Kratika Sengar

quote: I haven't got a lot of patience.
name: Jeffrey Katzenberg

quote: Patience has never been my strong suit.
name: Michael Chiklis

quote: Kids teach you a lot of patience.
name: Mona Singh

quote: I have very little patience with children.
name: Mem Fox

quote: That's why I never became a director. I never had patience with people.
name: Ray Harryhausen

quote: Difficult years lie ahead, patience is required.
name: Yiannis Stournaras

quote: A philosopher goes where the truth leads and has no patience with mere emotion.
name: John C. Wright
